channel.title: Requesting a Server, please make one for me
channel.description:
Well I was wondering if someone can make me the server bc i tried to and it got all messed up...it means a lot to me bc i want to have a server. Server will be owned by ME and YOU. Since there is no format for this i will post what i want, please help, it means so much. Thanks
When i say full dragon i mean full dragon with skirt and legs too!
Starting Equipment Full dragon with dds, fury, rune boots, cooking gauntlets, fury, and rune boots
Starting Stats 135HP 99 Smithing All other stats are 0
Lvling type Fast
Features Dragon smithing NO nulls both magic types work w/o runes Perfect ring (admins and mods only) gives 10k stat bonus to all stats (range def, melee def, etc.) PK everywhere BUT Varrock
NPCs Area Greater Demons (5 please) GDZ (wild) KBD a random dungeon Jad (3 please) Mage Arena (wild) (ALL) barrows brothers Varrock Central
Commands Effect ::prayer gives 1M ourg bones to raise prayer ::range teles u to range guild to range range (hit targets to raise it) ::dragon Gives full dragon with cooking gauntlets, rune boots, fury, and whip ::jad telepots u to Jad ::barrows gives u all barrows ::mime gives u full mime ::rune gives u full rune ::archer gives u karils top and bottom, robin hood set, crystal bow, and fury ::stone gives u (working) ring of stone ::cw teleports u to Castle Wars ::da teleports u to Duel Arena ::gdz teleports u to Greater Demons (wild) ::food gives u 1k Manta Rays ::home teleports u to Varrock (East Bank) ::legends gives legends cape, desert boots, and cooking gauntlets ::king gives full gilded ::switch Switches u to Ancients and vice versa ::bars gives rune and gold bars to smith (gold bars make dragon) ::KBD teleports u to a dungeon with the King Black Dragon ::maxme (Admin and mod only) gives u max lvl on all stats (135 on all CMB stats, 99 on non-cmb stats) [br][size=1]Posted on: January 24, 2007, 09:38:12 PM[/size][hr]You have control of the server meaning you can turn it online and offline, Me and You are automatically admins.

item.title: Requesting a Server, please make one for me
item.dc:creator: @Devil93065 Devil93065
item.description:
@Devil93065 wrote:

Even if you want a server, ask a friend to help or request one in off topic section or something, this is Server Advertisement, not Server Request Board. Find a server and try to help people on it or something and you might get a chance to become an admin.

Read full topic
item.source: Requesting a Server, please make one for me

item.title: Requesting a Server, please make one for me
item.dc:creator: @MMcgrady1 MMcgrady1
item.description:
@MMcgrady1 wrote:

Well I was wondering if someone can make me the server bc i tried to and it got all messed up…it means a lot to me bc i want to have a server. Server will be owned by ME and YOU. Since there is no format for this i will post what i want, please help, it means so much. Thanks

When i say full dragon i mean full dragon with skirt and legs too!

Starting Equipment
Full dragon with dds, fury, rune boots, cooking gauntlets, fury, and rune boots

Starting Stats
135HP
99 Smithing
All other stats are 0

Lvling type
Fast

Features
Dragon smithing
NO nulls
both magic types work w/o runes
Perfect ring (admins and mods only) gives 10k stat bonus to all stats (range def, melee def, etc.)
PK everywhere BUT Varrock

NPCs Area
Greater Demons (5 please) GDZ (wild)
KBD a random dungeon
Jad (3 please) Mage Arena (wild)
(ALL) barrows brothers Varrock Central

Commands Effect
::prayer gives 1M ourg bones to raise prayer
::range teles u to range guild to range range (hit targets to raise it)
::dragon Gives full dragon with cooking gauntlets, rune boots, fury, and whip
::jad telepots u to Jad
::barrows gives u all barrows
::mime gives u full mime
::rune gives u full rune
::archer gives u karils top and bottom, robin hood set, crystal bow, and fury
::stone gives u (working) ring of stone
::cw teleports u to Castle Wars
::da teleports u to Duel Arena
::gdz teleports u to Greater Demons (wild)
::food gives u 1k Manta Rays
::home teleports u to Varrock (East Bank)
::legends gives legends cape, desert boots, and cooking gauntlets
::king gives full gilded
::switch Switches u to Ancients and vice versa
::bars gives rune and gold bars to smith (gold bars make dragon)
::KBD teleports u to a dungeon with the King Black Dragon
::maxme (Admin and mod only) gives u max lvl on all stats (135 on all CMB stats, 99 on non-cmb stats)
[br][size=1]Posted on: January 24, 2007, 09:38:12 PM[/size][hr]You have control of the server meaning you can turn it online and offline, Me and You are automatically admins.
